oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sliding mode control design via reduced order model approach
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: BANDYOPADHYAY, B
ABERA, AGE
JANARDHANAN, S
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: variable-structure control
systems
sliding mode control

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The paper presents the design of sliding mode control for the higher order system via reduced order model. It has been shown that a sliding mode control designed for the reduced order model gives similar performance for the higher order system. The method has been illustrated by numerical examples.
